Name: Percentage of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all activity executions in the event log
Metric: Percentage of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' occurring as the first activity in a case
Metric: Number of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' activities

Name: Percentage of process variants that start with 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation'

Name: Number of times 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' is immediately followed by 'SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion'
Metric: Number of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' activities

Name: Percentage of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' that are followed at some point by 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Frequency of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' appearing before 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' in the same case
Metric: Number of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' activities

Name: Percentage of cases containing 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' that eventually reach 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'
Metric: Percentage of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all cases

Name: Ratio of the frequency of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' to the frequency of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'
Metric: Number of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' activities

Name: Percentage of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' that occur in cases ending with an EIC decision (e.g., 'SW-EIC Accept', 'SW-EIC Reject', 'SW-EIC Major Revision', 'SW-EIC Minor Revision', 'SW-EIC Reject & Resubmit')
Metric: Percentage of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all cases

Name: Number of distinct cases in which 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' appears
Metric: Number of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' activities

Name: Percentage of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' that are not followed by any reviewer-related activity (e.g., 'SW-Reviewer Agreed', 'SW-Reviewer Declined', 'SW-Reviewer No Response')
Metric: Percentage of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' in variants that include at least one reminder activity (e.g., 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' or 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2')
Metric: Number of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' activities

Name: Percentage of process variants containing 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' that also contain 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'
Metric: Percentage of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all cases

Name: Average number of activities occurring between 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and the first occurrence of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' in cases where both appear
Metric: the average of the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation'

Name: Percentage of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' that occur in cases where the manuscript is eventually accepted ('SW-EIC Accept' or 'RW-EIC Accept')
Metric: Percentage of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all cases
